topic.title: Any article/presentation/graphs/resource or suggestions that could help understand ZeroNet's architecture?
topic.body:
Posted on [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/comments/6e6kad/any_articlepresentationgraphsresource_or/) as well.

These could help reduce time and barrier to understand how ZeroNet is constructed and contribute to the project sooner. Any sharing will be appreciated.

[Update]
Maybe it is not a bad idea to collect these resources (except for the presentation given by author) to docs?

1604065942_mirrored_juinc_github.body: Hi @mkg20001 , thanks for your sharing. Actually I've read that presentation given by author so I am seeking for something explaining how ZeroNet is constructed. (Maybe someone's note?)
